Livvie: God, I love you, Jack. It's always been you. You've always protected me.
Jack: Shh.
Livvie: That's how I know you're going to protect us now. Just me and the baby -- you're going to take care of us, I know you will. I know it. You will.
Jack: Your hands are freezing cold, Livvie.
Livvie: Oh –
Jack: Look, I think you're in shock.
Livvie: No. No, jack, I'm going to be fine. Just take me home, ok?
Jack: Livvie –
Livvie: Take me home to our little house by the river -- just you, me, and the baby -- please.
Jack: You have to listen to me.
Livvie: We're just going to have -- we're going to sit up all night and we're going to -- and we're going to talk by the fire –
Jack: All right, look, I'm going to take you to the hospital. You need to go to the hospital right now, all right?
Livvie: No!
Jack: You need to see a doctor.
Livvie: No. Please. Don't do this to me, Jack, please.
Jack: You need to see a doctor.
Livvie: No. They're going to take her away from me, jack. She's all I have. Don’t. Please, don’t.
Jack: Your baby's gone.
Livvie: No.
Jack: I'm sorry.
Livvie: No! Stop it! You're just saying what they told you to say. You're lying!
Jack: No.
Livvie: Ow!

Jack: Livvie, I've never lied to you before. Look at me. Listen to me -- you cannot believe that I’m lying to you right now. I wish I could make this better. I know how bad you wanted that baby, but it's too late.
Livvie: She's gone? Oh, dear God. Oh, God! Oh, no! Oh, no, Jack, I lost my baby! Oh, no, I lost her!
Lucy: Steady, Livvie, steady. What are you doing out here wandering alongside the road? Do you know I almost hit you with my car? Come on, we got to go back to the hospital.
Tess: No!
Lucy: Yeah, we do. Don't be silly, you're very sick. They can take care of you at the hospital. Come on.
Tess: No, no!
Lucy: What's the matter with you? Come on, you're looking at me like you don't even know me. Livvie, no matter what's happened in the past, we're still family of some sort. Come on, Livvie.
Tess: No -- Tess.

Livvie: Oh, I promised her, Jack. I promised her I wouldn't let anything happen to her.
Jack: It's not your fault, Livvie.

Jack: You could've done nothing to prevent that.
